text: Bala Garhi is a town and Union Council of Mardan District in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. It is at 34°14'0N 72°9'0E and has a height of 302 metres (994 feet). Location of Balagarhi - Falling Rain Genomics ==References== Category:Union councils of Mardan District
title: Bala Garhi
